It's material is not 100% COTTON as has been specified in specification. The  specification claims 100% cotton product but it is made of 60% cotton and 40% polyester. See the images. This review is not based on usage. Fitting is perfect and the colour is as shown in the pic. Don't go for a larger size. But it is not for very cold places where temperature dips below 10 degree centigrade.

It fits well and looks very good. It doesn't look baggy and maintains a good shape with the chain both open and close. The color is bright but not too much. It also warm enough to wear around the house and outside. I personally use it when going for jogging, football or gym. I like it and you most probably will.

Sizes are huge.Allen solly 'L' size in summer clothes is 40 inches,While in winter clothes 'L' is 46 inches.'S' size in summer - 36 inches'S' size in winter - 40 inchesSummer clothing is manufactured for rats, and winter for elephants.

First appearance ,  it  looks a  used piece  the way it was received folded , crumpled. the internal packaging and the piece both crumpled , so keeping it safe for 4 to 5 days for quarantine before trying it for size , fitting etcFabric looks just ok, stitching quality creates doubt , frankly it doesn't appear an original product , no offencesShall review again later

Bought this product in Great Indian Sale @‚Çπ850/-. They are selling minor defective / rejected pieces. Ordered Size L initially which was tight for me, so exchanged for XL but it was lose. In L size piece the zipper was getting stuck near the bottom and In size XL there is a visible defect in the inside of the product (see attached pics). There were arrow stickers marked on the defect line in the clothing (which in clothing quality terms mean here is the defect). It is probably a quality rejected piece, so going out in sale at lower prices. Seller should be honest atleast in tagging this as refurbished piece.

The size of this product is not at all accurate. I got a smaller size product than the one which I booked considering the size chart given in the site.However, the product is a great one. It keeps you warm enough and the material used is of quite good quality.
